alert.note: Alert for Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 2:11PM CST until March 05 at 1:23PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Barry, McDonald, Newton and Stone. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 209 PM CST, River gauge reports indicated that flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain fell earlier today. - This includes the following low water crossings... Big Sugar Creek at Buzzard Glory Road, Rockhouse Creek at Farm Road 2145, Flat Creek at Highway C, Little Sugar Creek at Skaggs Hollow Road, Little Crane Creek at Old Wire Road, Flat Creek at Highway U and Shoal Creek at Farm Road 2110. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Branson, Monett, Cassville, Kimberling City, Silver Dollar City, Crane, Purdy, Reeds Spring, Seligman, Exeter, Wheaton, Indian Point, Branson West, Galena, Washburn, Fairview, Shell Knob, Butterfield, Mccord Bend, Golden, Emerald Beach, Eagle Rock, Pioneer, Hurley, Blue Eye, Stella, Chain-O-Lakes, Arrow Point, Coney Island, Jenkins, Mcdowell, Madry, Pleasant Ridge, Wheelerville, Wayne, Ridgley, Cape Fair, Elsey, Rocky Comfort and Lampe. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
